{{launch.mission_name}}

{{launch.details}}

import { HttpClient } from '@angular/common/http'; import { Component } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'app-missionlist', templateUrl: './missionlist.component.html', styleUrls: ['./missionlist.component.css'] }) export class MissionlistComponent { launches: any[] = []; flightNum: number | undefined; yearSelected: number | undefined; launchYears = ['2006', '2007', '2008', '2009', '2010', '2011', '2012', '2013', '2014', '2015', '2016', '2017', '2018', '2019', '2020']; constructor(private http: HttpClient) { this.loadLaunches(); } loadLaunches() { this.http.get('https://api.spacexdata.com/v3/launches').subscribe((launches: any) => { this.launches = launches; }); } getLaunchByYear(year: string) { this.http.get(`https://api.spacexdata.com/v3/launches?launch_year=${year}`).subscribe((response: any) => { this.launches = response; }); } filterLaunch(index: number, year: string) { this.getLaunchByYear(year); this.yearSelected = index; } clearFilter() { this.loadLaunches(); } }
